THE PROPOSED GRANT OF AUTHORITY TO OFFER AND GRANT OPTIONS AT A DISCOUNT OF UP TO 20% UNDER THE HATTEN ESOS

That subject to and contingent on the passing of Resolution 8, approval be and is hereby given for:

(a) the maximum discount that may be given under the Hatten ESOS to be up to 20% ot the Market Price for the Shares at the time of the grant of the Option; and

(b) the Directors to be authorised to offer Options at a maximum discount of up to 20% of the Market Price (as defined in the Appendix) for the Shares at the time of the grant of the Option.
